HTML Landing Page Template

This is an HTML Landing Page Template

Preview Page

Landing Page Template Features

This is Landing Page Template I made. My aim with this HTML landing page was to offer anyone intrested in websites a quick landing page solution for their next project.

Some of the features in this landing page include:

Auto Gallery Slider: This landing page contain an auto slider in the hero section at the top. The auto slider contains 3 slides that are in constantly rotating. 

Formspree Contact Form: Included in this landing page is also a form configured to work with Form spree form. To make this contact form work sign up for a Formspree account and drop your URL into the code and you're done. A free Formspree account gives you 50 free submission a month that you can redirect to your email. 

Font Family
